org.smartfrog.services.ssh
Class UserInfoImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.smartfrog.services.ssh.UserInfoImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.jcraft.jsch.UserInfo
public class UserInfoImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.jcraft.jsch.UserInfo

Implements UserInfo interface required by Jsch. Some of these methods are not in the current version of UserInfo; they are retained for historical compatibility, and, as they return false, incur no development/maintenance costs. At some point they may be deleted.

See Also:
UserInfo
